ygData.subject: Re: NEW SERVER UP!
ygData.msgSnippet: When you initiate a guildwar with another guild, you ll can PK members of the guild you are having a war with.
ygData.messageBody:
When you initiate a guildwar with another guild, you'll can PK members
of the guild you are having a war with.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> hey guys,i was playing abit last nite when suddenly a message bout a
> new server coming up... just yesterday... anyone plan on shifting?
> hehe... i have already researved those fav names i like on that server
> liaoz... hehe... if the whole guild is shifting... i dont mind doing
> it once... but no more than once... also another good way of avoiding
> QHD... btw... y Enteri say no support? u just want guild war isit?
> then i think the VZ or TZ will be a better place to be... since u cant
> really have
> guildwar... cheers,Nicademous--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
